choice.title: FakeSMC
choice.description: SMC device emulator by netkas. Required to run Mac OS X on non Apple's hardware. This modification supports hardware monitoring plugins

choice.title: IntelThermal
choice.description: IntelThermal plugin provides information about CPU core temperatures. Only for Intel CPUs

choice.title: ACPISensors
choice.description: ACPISensors plugin by slice requires extensive DSDT editing and understanding in ACPI programming

choice.title: ITE IT87x
choice.description: This plugin supports line of IT87x chipsets developed and manufactured by ITE Tech Inc. and usually used by Gigabyte in their mobos

choice.title: Winbond W836x
choice.description: This plugin supports line of W836x chipsets developed and manufactured by Winbond and usually used in Asus motherboards

choice.title: Fintek F718x
choice.description: This plugin supports line of F718x chipsets developed and manufactured by Fintek Industry Co. Ltd. and usually used in Intel motherboards

choice.title: NSC PC8739x
choice.description: NSCPC8739x by slice supports some of PC8739x chipsets developed and manufactured by National Semiconductor and used in some notebook and desktop mobos

choice.title: NVClockX
choice.description: NVClockX plugin by usr-sse2 is the NVClock port from Linux by alphamerik. Supports wide range of nVidia videocards up to GTX4xx Fermi family. Reported instability on some hardware configurations.

choice.title: RadeonX
choice.description: RadeonX plugin by slice provides sensors monitoring for AMD Radeon GPUs

choice.title: X3100
choice.description: Intel X3100 GPU sensors monitoring plugin by slice

choice.title: HWMonitor
choice.description: Simple utility to moitor values of all found sensors

choice.title: HWMonitor Menu Extra
choice.description: This will install HWMonitor Menu Extra utility showing in system status bar
